::Repressor::

Repressor nods to Squizzy, sitting back.

"Zardus," he says into his comm, "Feline is being reprogrammed. 
Anything else you need?"

"Yes," Zardus' voice replies, "Tell Squizzy to remove any memories of 
HotRod she may have. He seems to have turned a bit soft on us."

Repressor nods, walking over to Squizzy. "Zardus says to take out her 
memories of HotRod," he says to her, watching Feline sleep, "Can you 
do that?"






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> She was finishing up putting the reamins of the two bots into a 
> cryostorage bin when Repressor and Feline walked in. She looked at 
> them. "Ah, Feline. I was just talking about you with another bot. 
How 
> are you feeling?" she said in a cheerful and warm voice.
> 
> Feline2::
> She looked up at Squizzy. She didn't feel threatened by Squizzy, 
for 
> she was short and didn't look to be a fighter at all. Plus the fact 
> that Squizzy was the one who brought her back as it were. She 
> shurgged her shoulders. "Eh, I'm ok."
> 
> Squizzy::
> "That's excelent. Oh, by the way and while I'm thinging about it. I 
> have a new program to install in you. I found it and it's of your 
old 
> memories. Plus it has a few minor upgrades that your old body 
doesn't 
> have. Like a spark protection system. If you have the time, I can 
> install it for you and you'll be out of here in a just a half hour. 
> It won't take long at all. Would you please have a seat on the 
> biotable and I'll get started right away."
> She looked at Repressor. "This won't take long at all. If you want, 
> you can have a seat right here or wait outside." she said 
cheerfully.
> 
> Feline2::
> She walked over and jumped up onto the table.
> 
> Squizzy::
> "Feline, would you transform into bot mode. It will make it easier 
to 
> get this uploaded and faster as well."
> 
> Feline2::
> She transformed into bot mode and waited:
> 
> Squizzy::
> She walked over to the console and pushed a fe buttons. Then she 
> walked over to Feline and pulled a cable out of the table an hooked 
> it up to Feline's neural net hook up.  "Now don't worry about a 
> thing. You'll be out of here before you know it."
> She walked over and looked at the console. She brought up the 
> programs that FZ had given here. She looked at Feline,"Lay down and 
> relax." She watched as Feline lay down on the table, then started 
to 
> upload the predacon program.  While this was uploading, she walked 
> over to Feline, with a seringe in her hand and injected Feline with 
a 
> drug that would keep her asleep for several hours.  She then walked 
> over to Repressor. "Tell Zardus that I'll take care of Feline as 
> ordered."  She went back and checked her console. The pred program 
> was now 40% uploaded. When the prossess was complete, Feline would 
be 
> the promiscuos, bold, and deadly bot she once was.  And even more 
> loyal to Zardus than before.
